org.ptodd

Class States

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ptodd.States
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants

    public class States
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants
    Markov state machine Defines a Markov state machine which stores a set of node states, the links between them, and the weight of each link. An initially created Markov state machine will have two states named ("[Initial]" and "[Final]") with one connection (a weight of one) between the two. Created by ptdecker on 5/25/14.
